original_text: And he came in the Spirit into the temple, and when the parents brought in the child Jesus, to do for him according to the custom of the Law,
korean_text: 성령의 감동으로 성전에 들어가매 마침 부모가 율법의 관례대로 행하고자 하여 그 아기 예수를 데리고 오는지라

sentences.original_text: And he came in the Spirit
and when the parents brought in the child Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 부모가 아기 예수를 데리고 왔을 때

sentences.original_text: according to the custom of the Law
